languages.text: "А что касается амулета, или что он там — так с трупа сняли. Живых культистов в нашем секторе точно нет, но когда была заварушка — смелые ребята обобрали несколько тел. Такие хорошие ботинки потом принесли, каких я за всю жизнь ни у кого на нижних не видела. Видно, у этих культистов командиры получше, чем у нас".

"And as for this amulet, or whatever it is — they took it off a dead body. There are no cultists still breathing in our sector, that's for sure. But when that fight broke out, some enterprising folks looted the bodies. The boots they came back with — nobody's ever tread these decks in boots so fine, I can tell you that. Seems to me these cultists have better commanders than us."
languages.original_text: "А что касается амулета, или что он там — так с трупа сняли. Живых культистов в нашем секторе точно нет, но когда была заварушка — смелые ребята обобрали несколько тел. Такие хорошие ботинки потом принесли, каких я за всю жизнь ни у кого на нижних не видела. Видно, у этих культистов командиры получше, чем у нас".

traits.locale_text: "And as for this amulet, or whatever it is — they took it off a dead body. There are no pirates still breathing in our sector, that's for sure. But when that fight broke out, some enterprising folks looted the bodies. The boots they came back with — nobody's ever tread these decks in boots so fine, I can tell you that. Seems to me these pirates have better commanders than us."
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderOld

traits.locale_text: "And as for this amulet, or whatever it is — they took it off a dead body. There are no pirates still breathing in our sector, that's for sure. But when that fight broke out, some enterprising folks looted the bodies. The boots they came back with — nobody's ever tread these decks in boots so fine, I can tell you that. Seems to me these pirates have better commanders than us."

traits.locale_text: "And as for this amulet, or whatever it is — they took it off a dead body. There are no pirates still breathing in our sector, that's for sure. But when that fight broke out, some enterprising folks looted the bodies. The boots they came back with — nobody's ever tread these decks in boots so fine, I can tell you that. Seems to me these pirates have better commanders than us."

traits.locale_text: "And as for this amulet, or whatever it is — they took it off a dead body. There are no cultists still breathing in our sector, that's for sure. But when that fight broke out, some enterprising folks looted the bodies. The boots they came back with — nobody's ever tread these decks in boots so fine, I can tell you that. Seems to me these cultists have better commanders than us."
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderOld

languages.text: “至于那个护身符还是什么东西，那是他们从尸体上弄下来的。这片区域根本没有还在喘气的异端分子，这是肯定的。不过战斗爆发的时候，确实有几个胆子大的家伙把尸体上的东西搜刮了一通。他们拿回来的靴子，就这么说吧，从来没人穿过这么漂亮的靴子来过这片甲板。要我说，那群异端分子的指挥官比我们的指挥官更有钱。”
languages.original_text: "And as for this amulet, or whatever it is — they took it off a dead body. There are no cultists still breathing in our sector, that's for sure. But when that fight broke out, some enterprising folks looted the bodies. The boots they came back with — nobody's ever tread these decks in boots so fine, I can tell you that. Seems to me these cultists have better commanders than us."

traits.locale_text: “至于那个护身符还是什么东西，那是他们从尸体上弄下来的。这片区域根本没有还在喘气的海盗，这是肯定的。不过战斗爆发的时候，确实有几个胆子大的家伙把尸体上的东西搜刮了一通。他们拿回来的靴子，就这么说吧，从来没人穿过这么漂亮的靴子来过这片甲板。要我说，那群海盗的指挥官比我们的指挥官更有钱。”
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderOld

languages.text: «Y, en cuanto a este amuleto o lo que sea, se lo quitaron a un muerto. No hay cultistas con vida en nuestro sector; de eso no hay duda. Es solo que, cuando acabó la pelea, unos oportunistas saquearon los cuerpos. Trajeron unas botas... nadie ha pisado nunca estas cubiertas con unas botas tan elegantes, eso se lo aseguro. A mí me parece que estos cultistas tienen mejores comandantes que nosotros».
languages.original_text: "And as for this amulet, or whatever it is — they took it off a dead body. There are no cultists still breathing in our sector, that's for sure. But when that fight broke out, some enterprising folks looted the bodies. The boots they came back with — nobody's ever tread these decks in boots so fine, I can tell you that. Seems to me these cultists have better commanders than us."

traits.locale_text: «Y, en cuanto a este amuleto o lo que sea, se lo quitaron a un muerto. No hay piratas con vida en nuestro sector; de eso no hay duda. Es solo que, cuando acabó la pelea, unos oportunistas saquearon los cuerpos. Trajeron unas botas... nadie ha pisado nunca estas cubiertas con unas botas tan elegantes, eso se lo aseguro. A mí me parece que estos piratas tienen mejores comandantes que nosotros».
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderOld

languages.text: 「お守りだか何だか知らないけどね…あれは死体から取ったものさ。このセクターにまだ息をしている教団はいない、それは間違いないよ。でも、あの戦いが起きたとき、一部の連中が死体から略奪したんだ。そいつらが持って帰ってきたブーツは…こんな立派なブーツでこの甲板を歩いた者はいない、そう断言できるほどのものさ。教団どもには、あたしらよりも優秀な指揮官がいるようだね」
languages.original_text: "And as for this amulet, or whatever it is — they took it off a dead body. There are no cultists still breathing in our sector, that's for sure. But when that fight broke out, some enterprising folks looted the bodies. The boots they came back with — nobody's ever tread these decks in boots so fine, I can tell you that. Seems to me these cultists have better commanders than us."

traits.locale_text: 「お守りだか何だか知らないけどね…あれは死体から取ったものさ。このセクターにまだ息をしている教団はいない、それは間違いないよ。でも、あの戦いが起きたとき、一部の連中が死体から略奪したんだ。そいつらが持って帰ってきたブーツは…こんな立派なブーツでこの甲板を歩いた者はいない、そう断言できるほどのものさ。教団どもには、あたしらよりも優秀な指揮官がいるようだね」
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderOld

languages.text: "Und was dieses Amulett angeht, oder was es auch sein mag — das haben sie bei einer Leiche gefunden. Es gibt in unserem Sektor keine noch lebenden Kultisten, das steht fest. Aber als dieser Kampf ausgebrochen ist, haben einige geschäftstüchtige Leute die Leichen geplündert. Die Stiefel, in denen sie zurückgekommen sind — diese Decks hat noch nie jemand in so hochwertigen Stiefeln betreten, das kann ich Euch sagen. Diese Kultisten haben wohl bessere Kommandanten als wir."
languages.original_text: "And as for this amulet, or whatever it is — they took it off a dead body. There are no cultists still breathing in our sector, that's for sure. But when that fight broke out, some enterprising folks looted the bodies. The boots they came back with — nobody's ever tread these decks in boots so fine, I can tell you that. Seems to me these cultists have better commanders than us."

traits.locale_text: "Und was dieses Amulett angeht, oder was es auch sein mag — das haben sie bei einer Leiche gefunden. Es gibt in unserem Sektor keine noch lebenden Piraten, das steht fest. Aber als dieser Kampf ausgebrochen ist, haben einige geschäftstüchtige Leute die Leichen geplündert. Die Stiefel, in denen sie zurückgekommen sind — diese Decks hat noch nie jemand in so hochwertigen Stiefeln betreten, das kann ich Euch sagen. Diese Piraten haben wohl bessere Kommandanten als wir."
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderOld

languages.text: « Quant à cet objet, cette amulette, on l'a trouvée sur un cadavre. Je vous assure qu'il n'y a pas le moindre cultiste encore vie dans notre secteur. Simplement, quand le combat a éclaté, des petits malins ont décidé de fouiller les corps. Si vous aviez vu ce qu'ils ont rapporté... ce n'est pas tous les jours qu'on voit des bottes de cette qualité, par chez nous. Il faut croire que l'état-major de ces cultistes est autrement plus compétent que le nôtre. »
languages.original_text: "And as for this amulet, or whatever it is — they took it off a dead body. There are no cultists still breathing in our sector, that's for sure. But when that fight broke out, some enterprising folks looted the bodies. The boots they came back with — nobody's ever tread these decks in boots so fine, I can tell you that. Seems to me these cultists have better commanders than us."

traits.locale_text: « Quant à cette amulette, ou quoi que ce soit d'autre, on l'a trouvée sur un cadavre. Je vous assure qu'il n'y a pas le moindre pirate encore vie dans notre secteur. Simplement, quand le combat a éclaté, des petits malins ont décidé de fouiller les corps. Si vous aviez vu ce qu'ils ont rapporté... ce n'est pas tous les jours qu'on voit des bottes de cette qualité, par chez nous. Il faut croire que l'état-major de ces pirates est autrement plus compétent que le nôtre. »
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderOld

languages.text: "Uğurluk mu ne haltsa... Onu da ölü birinin üstünde buldular. Bizim sektörümüzde soluk alan tek bir tarikatçı yoktur, bunu temin ederim. Gelgelelim çatışma çıkınca bazı fırsatçılar, ölenleri yağmalamış. Giydikleri çizmeleri görünce aklımız şaştı. Bu güverteye ayak basan kimse böylesi nefis çizmeler giymemiştir. Bu tarikatçıların başındaki komutanlar, bizim başımızdakilerden daha iyi gibi geliyor bana."
languages.original_text: "And as for this amulet, or whatever it is — they took it off a dead body. There are no cultists still breathing in our sector, that's for sure. But when that fight broke out, some enterprising folks looted the bodies. The boots they came back with — nobody's ever tread these decks in boots so fine, I can tell you that. Seems to me these cultists have better commanders than us."

traits.locale_text: "Uğurluk mu, ne haltsa... Onu da ölü birinin üstünde buldular. Bizim sektörümüzde soluk alan tek bir tarikatçı yoktur, bunu temin ederim. Ama çatışma çıkınca bazı fırsatçılar ölenleri yağmalamış. Giydikleri çizmeleri görünce aklımız şaştı. Bu güverteye ayak basan kimse böylesi nefis çizmeler giymemiştir. Bu tarikatçıların başındaki komutanlar, bizim başımızdakilerden daha iyi gibi geliyor bana."
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderOld
